name: Theatre of Conflict: Crimea
blurb: Put the tabletop in your pocket!  \nOur new spin on turn-based strategy for Android devices.

rewards.reward: HORS DE COMBAT:  A great big thank you on our website.\r\nEvery little helps!
TROOPER: A copy of the game shortly before the official release in Summer 2013, and our thanks on the website!

BUGLER: Our exclusive digital bundle (including Wallpaper, screensaver multi-player avatars, and exclusive android wallpaper for your device) a copy of the game shortly before the official release in Summer 2013, and our thanks on the website!

MENTION IN DESPATCHES: Just \u00a325 will get you all the above rewards and a personalised video message from the Sergeant Major recorded just for you and published on youtube (this could be a birthday message or a declaration of love... the choice is yours)

WAR ARTIST: You will receive a card mounted signed limited edition print of the in game artwork (1 of the 6 available at random). As well as this you will get the game, digital package, and mention on the website befitting your rank.

QUEEN'S SHILLING:  You get an authentic period coin (pre 1900) to seal your allegiance to the Theatre of Conflict project. It will include a presentation box and our Theatre of Conflict certificate of authenticity.  You'll also receive our \u00a315 bundle (the game shortly before release, and all the digital goodies)

WAR CORRESPONDENT: All backers of \u00a3100 and more will get their name on the in-game roll of honour (also known as game credits!) as well as the website.\r\nAs if this wasn't enough, you also get a wonderful version of the famous poem by Lord Tennyson "Charge of the Light Brigade" with artwork and card mounting.\r\nOf course, you'll also get the game and digital bundle.

TROOP SGT. MAJOR: We'll be sending you a beautifullly hand-painted miniature Coldstream Guardsman. We're having 50 of these painted, and issuing them with a numbered "Theatre of Conflict" certificate of authenticity.\r\nYou'll also get your name in the game credits (under your rank) and all the \u00a315 pound rewards (game, digital bundle, etc).

CAMP OUTFITTER: We are offering for those fashion conscious backers a Theatre of Conflict "Crimean Tour" t-shirt (the ones we've had made for the dev team!). \r\nThis of course also includes the game and digital package along with a big thank you on the website and your name and rank in the game credits!
OFFICERS MESS: You will receive all 6 pieces of signed artwork available in the \u00a350 reward along with the game, the digital package, and your name in the game credits.

CORPORAL OF HORSE: We'll send you a hand-painted mounted 17th Lancer. We're having 50 of these especially painted, and issuing them with a numbered Theatre of Conflict certificate of authenticity.\r\nWe'll also send you all the rewards at the \u00a315 level (the game and the digital package) and your name in the game credits (alongside your rank!)

GENERAL: We are doing a run of 10 sets of hand-painted miniatures, comprising the rivals Lord Lucan and Lord Cardigan, together with our special certificate of authenticity.\r\nIn addition to this, we'll be sending you an extremely limited bound facsimile copy and transcription (just over 25 pages) of an as yet unpublished personal memoir of Troop Sergeant Major Francis Dickinson of the 17th Lancers (John's Great Great Grandfather).\r\nYou'll also get your name (and rank) in the game credits, and all the rewards at the \u00a315 level

BATTERY COMMANDER: This reward goes with a bang! An impressive 9pdr cannon and 4 crew from the Royal Artillery, beautifully hand-painted hand painted together with our "Theatre of Conflict" certificate of authenticity.\r\nWe'll also send you the bound copy of the journal mentioned above, and, of course your name (and rank) in the game credits and all the rewards at the \u00a315 level

ROLL CALL: This level is really quite special.  You can send us a digital picture of yourself or a loved one and we can render you (or them) into the game itself! You will also get your name in the game credits together with the game and the digital package.

FIELD MARSHAL: The thin Red Streak  comprises 12 Beautifully hand-painted Highlanders (including special characters and a standard bearer.  We're only having two of these made,  confirmed by our certificate of authenticity.  Of course you'll also get your name in the credits, the game and digital bundle.

RECCONAISANCE MISSION: For those that fancy a day out we would be more than happy to meet you at the Crimean war museum  in Nottingham before taking you for lunch and then a visit to the factory where you can see the models made. Of course you will also  receive the game and the digital package

MINISTER OF WAR: Our Charge of the Light Brigade reward level.  We have a stunning set of hand-painted miniatures, comprising 15 mounted 17th Lancers, and 2 complete Russian Cannon Crews.  We're only producing 2 of these, so they are highly collectable. \r\nWe will also send you the Journal mentioned at the \u00a3500 level, and all the digital rewards mentioned at the \u00a315 level.
